page.title: 16Shopping Facilities
page.content:
In Chalgrove these are as follows: BUTCHER:Mr Frost and family,sells some fruit and veg too. NEWSAGENT:Ashworths,sells toys, cigaretts and sweets too. CHEMIST:Toiletries,baby goods,medicine SUPERMARKETS:Londis and WavyLine sell mainly groceries and have off-licences. BAKER:Croxfords bakery and Post office. A van selling fish comes on Fridays and a fish-and-chip van visits weekly.
